full_sentence: Can you believe this, people believe that the Talmud authorizes Jews to rape babies. Some as young as Three. Gotta save their faces and run an identity search. I see a ton of racist comments from public profiles of stupid people mostly on Instagram, I‘d like to know if there’s a way to screw them over to their school over hate speech

so i think everyone knows that I'm pretty outspoken but i still get so annoyed with random people just arguing with me over differing opinions. Yeah I think there is something wrong with mozzies, and you cant tell me otherwise or stop me. Where is my free speech???
